title: we cant log you in right now because the patcher service is unavailable help!!!
body: i was downloading the patch i do not know if it stopped or something but everyone else can log in but i cant it says we cant log you in right now because the patcher service is unavailable does anyone know how to fix this or do i have to reinstall league?

replies.body:
That's pretty weird! In case this is caused by a hiccup in your network, I'd recommend rebooting your PC, then your home network. You can reboot the network by pulling the power plug from your Modem/Router temporarily (~60 seconds) and plugging it back in.

Let me know if this caused any change for you!

This is still an issue. All other games I currently have downloaded as well as browsers and internet-reliant apps all work without any hiccups. League can still work for me, with extreme patience. Normally I get the issue every time I try to log in. Waiting about 15~45 minutes usually allows me to click the log in button. Only to wait another set of time waiting to click the Play button. Sometimes being unable to create a game lobby or accept invites to such for another set of time. Please fix this issue.
I just had the same issue
I looked into this as well but was unable to find any issues with our patching servers last night.  Do let me know if this is still an issue!

Yes it is still an issue. I've had a month break from league, and now in order to play i have to restart my pc several times before it let me log in, this is ridiculous... My internet works fine and i can play other online games, restarting internet or switching regions doesn't help.
Tryed to switch on NA sevrer, the patcher is constantly restarting, help plz :3

I had the same issue (OCE) and when i tried chaning regions the patch would not load.
I fixed mine by clicking the settings on the client and under troubleshoot selecting to initiate full repair, took about 10 minutes and is working fine now.
Hope this helps.
Had the same issue, changed my DNS settings to the google dns and I could login straight away
I did the change region thing and it worked

I figured out how to get around it. You have to change your server, I chose Oceana. Now it will let you try to log in, and it will complete the patch. Then you can go back to NA server (or whatever server you use) and it will work good as new.
Same issue, restarted my computer and the router. No change.
Same, just moments ago, repair, restart, region change, legacy client, router restart. All didn't work. Was logged in when it started, and couldn't "Play Game". Now can't login.
I am having the same issue!

Restarted pc, and then network.  No change.
Edit:  Logged into Legacy and it works just fine.  Seems like an Alpha client issue.
